name: COCO
0:
”Alexa, turn on my blinds”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The skill content is in English (US)
Use this skill to send Voice Commands to the devices in your private COCONet.
 
This skill requires the smart home solution powered by COCO, which includes a COCO's WiFi/Ethernet devices like Cameras, as well as the COCO gateway.

COCO is an interoperable eco-system that allows you to control all 3rd party Zigbee or Z-wave devices that are linked to the COCO gateway. 

Currently, the following device types are supported:
1. Plugs
2. Relays
3. Switches
4. Bulbs
5. Curtain Contols
6. Contact Sensor
7. Motion Sensor
8. Temperature Sensor
9. Humidity Sensor

You will need to sign in with the COCO System to use the skill feature.

To share your feedback, you can contact us at mail@elear.solutions
